text: You are walking along the beach when you notice something shiny on the ground a few feet away. As you move closer, you see that it's a green bottle with jagged edges around the rim. You pick it up and realize there's a message inside the bottle. You are concerned that the jagged edges will cut you if you reach inside, but you are curious about its continents. What do you do?

choices.text: Reach inside the bottle to retrieve the message
Decide not to risk it and put the bottle down

text: You carefully stick your finger in to the bottle and are able to slowly pull out the note without injury. You start to unfold the message and you read the following: 'Hidden fortunes are in your future, if you are brave and wise. Find the seagull. She will show you the way.' At that moment, you see a seagull fly over your head, flying southbound. You also notice a sign in the opposite direction called 'Sirene Seagull Motel'. Which direction do you head?
You continue on walking and have a boring day. The end

You run and run and try to catch the seagull, but it's going too fast. You sprint as hard as you can to follow it. You get going so fast that your legs buckle underneath you. You tumble to the ground and feel a searing pain in your right arm. You think your arm is broken. You cry over your misfortune as the ambulence arrives. The end

You start walking towards the Sirene Seagull Motel. As the motel comes into view, you see that it is quite old and run down. The paint is chipping and a number of window shutters have become unhinged with age. As you open the creaky gate that leads onto the property, you feel a sudden chill. You notice a sign in the window that says 'Closed indefinately'. You reach out to the door handle and turn... to your surprise, the door cracks open, darkness lurks inside. What do you do?

You turn around and walk away. As you exit the gate, you feel the temperature rise back to normal and a strange calm comes over you. You wonder what may have been inside, but you decide to forget about the mysterious message in the bottle and continue about your day. The end
